page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: people in our household are Grandma Father ,Mother ,Older brother(14), Myself (girl 11), Sister(6), Brother (4) in a bungalow with extension bedrooms, & separate garage. We rise at 7am. My brother dresses in school uniform, has breakfast. 7:15 the rest have our breakfast. We have cereal, bacon & eggs or similar. My brother catches the secondary school bus to Middleton Cheney at 8. My dad goes to the coal yard between 8-9. My mum and gran start the house work.My sister and I go to school at 8:30. We go home for a cooked lunch with our parents, then return to school at 1:15. School finishes at 3:30.My regular jobs are washing and drying up & vacuum cleaning. My sister has to help me. We have bread & butter for tea at 6pm. I like to read, watch TV, or play outside with my sister.My brother has
